description.value: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.

Bol’bara makes two melee attacks.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d4 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 1d10 + @mod type=force average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] casts [[lookup @item.name]].

When fully possessed by her patron, Bol’bara can take 2 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. Bol’bara regains spent legendary actions at the start of her turn.

Incorporeal Dash. Bol’bara moves up to her speed. She can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes [[/damage 1d10 type=force average=true]] damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

Zone of Calamity (Costs 2 Actions). A 15-foot-radius &Reference[sphere]{sphere} of magical confusion extends from a point Bol’bara can see within 60 feet of her and spreads around corners. Each creature that starts its turn in that area is treated as if targeted by the confusion spell (save DC 12). The &Reference[sphere]{sphere} lasts as long as Bol’bara maintains &Reference[concentration]{concentration}, up to 1 minute (as if concentrating on a spell).

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Bol’bara moves up to her speed. She can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes [[/damage 1d10 type=force average=true]] damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

A 15-foot-radius &Reference[sphere]{sphere} of magical confusion extends from a point Bol’bara can see within 60 feet of her and spreads around corners. Each creature that starts its turn in that area is treated as if targeted by the confusion spell (save DC 12). The &Reference[sphere]{sphere} lasts as long as Bol’bara maintains &Reference[concentration]{concentration}, up to 1 minute (as if concentrating on a spell).

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Dark One’s Blessing. When Bol’bara reduces a hostile creature to 0 hit points, she gains 6 temporary hit points.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Nimble Escape. Bol’bara can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of her turns.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Possessed Alignment. When Bol'bara is fully possessed, her alignment becomes Chaotic Evil.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Innate Spellcasting. Bol’bara’s innate spellcasting ability is &Reference[cha]{Charisma} (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no &Reference[material]{material} components:

At will: eldritch blast, false life, mage armor, mage hand

1/day each: charm person, hex, hold person, invisibility

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 &Reference[force]{force} damage.

The spell creates more than one beam when you reach higher levels: two beams at 5th level, three beams at 11th level, and four beams at 17th level. You can direct the beams at the same target or at different ones. Make a separate attack roll for each beam.

Bolstering yourself with a necromantic facsimile of life, you gain 1d4 + 4 &Reference[temporaryhitpoints]{temporary hit points} for the duration.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you gain 5 additional &Reference[temporaryhitpoints]{temporary hit points} for each slot level above 1st.

You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical &Reference[force]{force} surrounds it until the spell ends. The target's base AC becomes 13 + its &Reference[dex]{Dexterity} modifier. The spell ends if the target dons armor or if you dismiss the spell as an action.

A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

You can use your action to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

You attempt to charm a &Reference[humanoid]{humanoid} you can see within range. It must make a &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} saving throw, and does so with advantage if you or your companions are fighting it. If it fails the saving throw, it is &Reference[charmed]{charmed} by you until the spell ends or until you or your companions do anything harmful to it. The &Reference[charmed]{charmed} creature regards you as a friendly acquaintance. When the spell ends, the creature knows it was &Reference[charmed]{charmed} by you.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

Choose a &Reference[humanoid]{humanoid} that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} saving throw or be &Reference[paralyzed]{paralyzed} for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional &Reference[humanoid]{humanoid} for each slot level above 2nd. The humanoids must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

A creature you touch becomes &Reference[invisible]{invisible} until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is &Reference[invisible]{invisible} as long as it is on the target's person. The spell ends for a target that attacks or casts a spell.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.
